response.original_title: The Berzerker: The Principles And Practices Of The Berzerker
response.overview: Over 4 hours of the most extreme band on the planet - witness The Berzerker live + behind the scenes mayhem.  Contained on this DVD is some of the most comprehensive studio footage ever released to the public. It was not initially shot as a documentary and serves as a Fly-on-the-wall experience into the recording process.  Prepare yourself for a journey into a world where each step will give you a better understanding of your own reality.  This DVD has been made by the band for the fans. ENJOY
response.title: The Berzerker: The Principles And Practices Of The Berzerker
